name: Dulp
description:
Dulp is a simple one-touch arcade game that task player to launch matching color projectiles towards a rotating target.

Players are required to observe the pattern of each individual ring and fire the projectile at the right moment. Hitting another color even just partially will cause the player to fail the level.

Clear each level in this fast and simple game by removing all the colored sections on the rings.

Be focused and wait for the right moment. How far can you go?
